scenes.text: There lived a King named Data Engineer.
Until one day, there was a divine prophecy.
That AI will bring an apocalypse...
And the King must act before it's too late.
The King prayed to Lord of Data, to save his Kingdom.
Pleased by the King's devotion, the Lord of Data granted him a vision.
A vision of a new era, where Data Engineering will become an AI Avtar.
To increase productivity with the help of Artifical Intelligence.
As Data God will incarnate in an AI, to be known as...
